languages.text: "Для меня честь принадлежать к {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}духовенству{/g} Марса. Направляемые его догматами, мы храним технологию от нечистых и непросвещенных".

traits.locale_text: {n}Механический голос наполняется сухим треском, а механодендриты вскидываются горделивым металлическим веером.{/n} "Я горжусь принадлежностью к {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}алому духовенству{/g} Омниссии. Направляемые его догматами, мы храним технологию от нечистых и непросвещенных".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "I am honoured to belong to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g}. Guided by its tenets, we safeguard technology against the impure and the unenlightened."
languages.original_text: "Для меня честь принадлежать к {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}духовенству{/g} Марса. Направляемые его догматами, мы храним технологию от нечистых и непросвещенных".

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechanical voice fills with dry crackling, and the mechanodendrites spread out proudly like a metallic fan.{/n} "I am honored to belong to Omnissiah's {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}crimson priesthood{/g}. Guided by his tenets, we keep the technology from the impure and the unenlightened."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechanical voice fills with dry crackling, and the mechanodendrites spread out proudly like a metallic fan.{/n} "I am honored to belong to Omnissiah's {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}crimson priesthood{/g}. Guided by his tenets, we keep the technology from the impure and the unenlightened."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Guided by His tenets, we guard technology against the impure and unenlightened."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Guided by His tenets, we guard technology against the impure and unenlightened."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am honoured to belong to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g}. Guided by its tenets, we safeguard technology against the impure and the unenlightened."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Me siento honrado de pertenecer al {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}sacerdocio de Marte{/g}. Guiados por sus preceptos, salvaguardamos la tecnología contra los impuros y los legos».
languages.original_text: "I am honoured to belong to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g}. Guided by its tenets, we safeguard technology against the impure and the unenlightened."

traits.locale_text: «Me siento honrado de pertenecer al {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}sacerdocio de Marte{/g}. Guiados por sus preceptos, salvaguardamos la tecnología contra los impuros y los legos».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「名誉あることに、自分は{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}火星の神官団{/g}に属していた。その信条に導かれ、我々は不純なものや無知なものから技術を守っている」
languages.original_text: "I am honoured to belong to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g}. Guided by its tenets, we safeguard technology against the impure and the unenlightened."

traits.locale_text: 「名誉あることに、自分は{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}火星の神官団{/g}に属していた。その信条に導かれ、我々は不純なものや無知なものから技術を守っている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我很荣幸能成为{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}火星祭司{/g}中的一员。在其信条的指引下，我们保护技术免受污秽与愚昧的损害。”
languages.original_text: "I am honoured to belong to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g}. Guided by its tenets, we safeguard technology against the impure and the unenlightened."

traits.locale_text: “我很荣幸能成为{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}火星祭司{/g}中的一员。在其信条的指引下，我们保护技术免受污秽与愚昧的损害。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai l'honneur d'appartenir au {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}clergé de Mars{/g}. Guidés par ses préceptes, nous protégeons la technologie de la convoitise des impurs et de ceux qui n'ont pas reçu la lumière. »
languages.original_text: "I am honoured to belong to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g}. Guided by its tenets, we safeguard technology against the impure and the unenlightened."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai l'honneur d'appartenir au {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}clergé de Mars{/g}. Guidés par ses préceptes, nous protégeons la technologie de la convoitise des impurs et de ceux qui n'ont pas reçu la lumière. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe die Ehre, der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesterschaft des Mars anzugehören{/g}. Von ihren Lehren geleitet schützen wir die Technologie vor den Unreinen und Nichterleuchteten."
languages.original_text: "I am honoured to belong to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g}. Guided by its tenets, we safeguard technology against the impure and the unenlightened."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe die Ehre, der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesterschaft des Mars anzugehören{/g}. Von ihren Lehren geleitet schützen wir die Technologie vor den Unreinen und Nichterleuchteten."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am honoured to belong to the priesthood of Mars. Guided by its tenets, we safeguard technology against the impure and the unenlightened."

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Mars Rahipliği'nin{/g} bir parçası olmaktan onur duymaktayım. Rahipliğin öğretileri rehberliğinde teknolojiyi, saf olmayanlardan ve aydınlanmamışlardan koruruz."
languages.original_text: "I am honoured to belong to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g}. Guided by its tenets, we safeguard technology against the impure and the unenlightened."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Mars Rahipliği{/g}'nin bir parçası olmaktan onur duymaktayım. Teknolojiyi, onun öğretileri sayesinde saf olmayanlardan ve aydınlanmamışlardan koruruz."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
